entries.title: OpenAI is hiring developers to make ChatGPT better at coding
entries.description: Developers aim to create lines of code and explanations of it in natural language, according to Semafor.

entries.title: Glowforge Pro review: Laser cutting and engraving for serious makers and small businesses
entries.description: If you have the money and space, and can put up with some noise and odor, the Glowforge Pro will allow you to undertake an impressive range of creative projects.

entries.title: The 10 best tech-themed gift cards to give in 2023

entries.title: Samsung Unpacked 2023: How to watch and what you need to know
entries.description: On Wednesday, Samsung will hold its Unpacked 2023 event where it will drop its latest tech. Here is how you can tune in.

entries.title: Lectric XP Lite e-bike review: A sheer ($800) joy to ride
entries.description: Electric bikes priced below $1,000 usually mean lots of compromises. The Lectric XP Lite shatters those expectations.

entries.title: How to set up an Apple Watch
entries.description: Despite how incredibly versatile the Apple Watch is, its setup process is absurdly simple. Still, there are a few things you should know to make it even easier.

entries.title: How to run a Windows app on Linux with Wine
entries.description: If you want to make the Linux operating system your go-to but still need to run Windows apps, Wine has you covered.

entries.title: 5 iOS 16 features I can't live without now (and how to use them)

entries.title: LG revamps UltraGear line with stunning 45-inch OLED curved gaming monitor
entries.description: LG has launched its first UltraGear OLED gaming monitors, starting with two models: a 45-inch curved monitor and a 27-inch 1440p monitor. Both offer high-quality displays with a 'world-first' 240Hz refresh rate and 0.03ms response time. You can pre-order them now.

entries.title: Flash sale: The MSI Summit E13 Flip just dropped to $600
entries.description: Save over $900 on this touchscreen laptop.

entries.title: The simple way to add more complications to your Apple Watch
entries.description: I love my Apple Watch complications, and even the Apple Watch Ultra doesn't let me have enough. So, here's what I do.

entries.title: The 5 best cheap 3D printers of 2023
entries.description: 3D printing can bring your art to life, but you need the right 3D printer. ZDNET analyzed the best cheap 3D printers under $300 for your personal or professional use.

entries.title: PikaOS is a next-gen Linux distribution aimed specifically toward gamers
entries.description: With its Ubuntu base, PikaOS makes gaming and standard desktop usage on Linux fairly straightforward.

entries.title: This Acer 516 GE Chromebook is $200 off at Best Buy
entries.description: At 31% off, the Acer 516 GE Cloud Gaming Chromebook showcases impressive specs along with its impressive discount at Best Buy.

entries.title: ChatGPT can't make music, but Google's new AI model can
entries.description: Google is sharing information about a new, experimental AI model, MusicLM, which can create a song from a simple text input.

entries.title: OLED vs. QLED: Which is better?

entries.title: The 5 best VPN trials of 2023
entries.description: VPN trials are a great way to test a VPN's speed and reliability before you commit. Here are ZDNET's picks for the best VPN trials you should take advantage of in 2023.

entries.title: Building software these days: Design thinking, hybrid teams, and, of course, DevOps
entries.description: There's an urgency for 'thinking about development from the lens of the user experience first, and solution second,' says Cisco CIO Fletcher Previn.

entries.title: AI has caused a renaissance of tech industry R&D, says Meta's chief AI scientist
entries.description: There are many promising commercial applications already that may lead to productivity increases, but, ultimately, AI must develop an ability to plan if it is to truly advance, says Yann LeCun.

entries.title: Foldable iPad is coming and could arrive in 2024, says analyst
entries.description: Move over foldable phones, a foldable iPad could be in the works from Apple.

entries.title: Microsoft warning: Protect this critical piece of your tech infrastructure

entries.title: You can now buy the Ring video doorbell for only $35 on Amazon
